CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: javelin
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A heavy metal tip attached to a long wooden pole, packing a very strong punch against scarcely armored targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: flame arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Metal open cage arrowhead containing incendiary components for setting targets alight.
